channel.title: Prepare on Hugo Scenario-Based Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Prepare on Hugo Scenario-Based Documentation

item.title: Prepare the Required Tools
item.description: Install and Configure Visual Studio Code Download Visual Studio Code (VS Code). Install VS Code with the default settings. Open VS Code. Click Extensions and search “markdown”. In the search result, find and install the following two plug-ins: Markdown All in One: Markdown assistant tool markdownlint: Markdown style checking and quick fix tool Install Git Prerequisite: The editor (for example, Visual Studio Code) to be used as Git’s default editor has been installed.

item.title: Plan the Project Structure
item.description: Plan how you will store the Hugo installation file and your website project. In this document, we will use the following project structure. |-hugo |-bin |-hugo.exe |-techdocs.github.io <--Your site directory
